description: System-generated unique identifier for the building record; used as the primary key for joins and references.
Human-readable building identifier or name used in the application (e.g., facility, plaza, vendor shop).
Free-text description of the building, such as location details, landmark, or purpose.
Primary street address line for the building.
Optional second address line (suite, unit, floor, etc.).
Optional third address line for extended addressing needs.
City of the building’s mailing or physical address.
State or province for the building’s address, typically as a code.
Postal or ZIP code for the building’s address.
Country for the building’s address.
County or parish where the building is located.
Primary telephone number for the building or site contact.
Fax number for the building or site.
Label describing the secondary phone (e.g., dispatch, after-hours, security).
Secondary phone number corresponding to the labeled purpose.
General notes about the building, operations, access, or other context.
Timestamp when the record was last updated in the system.
Likely identifier of the user who last modified the record; sample appears to show timestamps—confirm with SME.
User ID that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
User ID that most recently modified the record.
Timestamp when the record was most recently modified.
